title: Entrepreneurial Leadership Development for Mid-Level Managers: Contextual Learning Program Based on Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in mathematics education and mid-level management experience
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment program executed in smartphone-centric, limited technological environments. Highlights learning scenarios reflecting real workplace situations and reflective practice.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze actual educational field constraints and derive three or more entrepreneurial leadership strategies.
Learners can perform role-playing to propose innovative ideas to peer teachers through situational problem-solving case studies.
Learners can record and evaluate leadership behavior changes three or more times via mobile-based reflective journaling.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
